about_the_game:
"In a frightening night of 1956, a nine years old child, Allison, killed her parents and died in a dreadful asylum.
The diary she wrote is said to contain the horrible truth about how she killed them.
You are Guglielmo Carter, a dauntless reporter interested in finding her diary and revealing its hidden secrets."

Allison's Diary: Rebirth is a first person survival horror, where you will have to search for the truth while exploring realistic and graphically stunning environments, facing terrible enemies and scary jump scares.
Escape from entities in the darkness, or try to fight lighting them up with the only weapon you have: your flashlight.
Collect batteries to recharge it, and get items and clues useful to proceed in the story.

Features
- Run or fight: you decide your gameplay style against enemies
- Adaptive and random AI: every time you play will be differently challenging
- Completely free environments to be explored
- Immersive UI: we tried to be as much realistic as possible, no on screen life-bars
- Next gen graphics and 3D audio: to make you really feel "inside" the world we imagined

KR Games


As a small independent team, we started in 2016 making games for Android, growing fast and working hard to achieve the best possible video gaming experience, combining our passion and the latest available technologies, winking to the future of digital entertainment.
From the original top selling series "Allison's Diary: The Trilogy" for mobile VR, we are excited to bring to the PC, with a whole new gameplay logic and enhanced graphics, one of the most terrifying and intense horror game of the last two years.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages,
or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

name: Allison's Diary: Rebirth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself into this terrifying first person horror adventure, where you will have to explore and search for the truth about the night Allison killed her parents, while trying to survive against the darkness.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
